messages.title: Scotland has the right to choose!
messages.content:
This General Election is one of the most important in Scotland’s history!

Boris Johnson, his Brexiteers and the Dark Money behind them, are determined to push through the Hardest of Brexits - while Scottish Government compromise proposals have been disregarded out of hand.

Whether a Hard Brexit or a No-Deal Brexit, both will result in tariffs, bureaucracy and border delays - damaging our Scottish manufacturers, our local industry, farmers and fishermen!

We must defend our Scottish Parliament after all 13 Scottish Tory MPs voted to take powers over 24 Devolved policies to Westminster. Labour, the so-called ‘Party of Devolution’ abstained!

We have the right to choose our future: part of Brexit Britain or an Independent Country?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Helping individuals, who are struggling with UK Government agencies such as the DWP, to get unjust decisions overturned.
Helping secure the Ayrshire Growth Deal for local industries, supporting local groups to improve our communities, promoting active travel and making our communities Dementia friendly.
Challenging the Health threats from Tory Brexit and Austerity - loss of EU staff, medicine shortages, rising child and pensioner poverty.

leaflet.personalStatement:
It has been a privilege to represent the people of Central Ayrshire at Westminster for the last 4½ years and to be:

· Your Personal Champion - helping individuals, who are struggling with UK Government agencies such as the DWP, to get unjust decisions overturned.

· Constituency Champion - helping secure the Ayrshire Growth Deal for local industries, supporting local groups to improve our communities, promoting active travel and making our communities Dementia friendly.

· SNP Shadow Health Spokesperson - challenging the Health threats from Tory Brexit and Austerity - loss of EU staff, medicine shortages, rising child and pensioner poverty.

examples: All 13 Scottish Tory MPs voted to take powers over 24 Devolved policies to Westminster.
This General Election is one of the most important in Scotland’s history!
Boris Johnson, his Brexiteers and the Dark Money behind them, are determined to push through the Hardest of Brexits.
We have the right to choose our future: part of Brexit Britain or an Independent Country?
It has been a privilege to represent the people of Central Ayrshire at Westminster for the last 4½ years.
I have worked hard to make a difference - I hope you will again put your trust in me as your MP.
Helping secure the Ayrshire Growth Deal for local industries, supporting local groups to improve our communities, promoting active travel and making our communities Dementia friendly.
Challenging the Health threats from Tory Brexit and Austerity - loss of EU staff, medicine shortages, rising child and pensioner poverty.
We must defend our Scottish Parliament after all 13 Scottish Tory MPs voted to take powers over 24 Devolved policies to Westminster.
Boris Johnson, his Brexiteers and the Dark Money behind them, are determined to push through the Hardest of Brexits.
